Description:
Off The Plan! Modern, High Quality Craftsmanship!
A perfect opportunity arises to secure this off-the-plan opportunity for this exceptional designer townhouse built to phenomenal standards situated in one of Clayton South's most favourable locations.
Appealing to homebuyers, downsizer's, young professionals and astute investors, this stylish and chic living set within walking distance to Westall Train Station and only minutes away from Clayton central, local schools and parklands, you will not find a better growth location!
Comprises: 3 spacious bedrooms, 2 bedrooms upstairs with ensuite (master with WIR), downstairs modern central bathroom, stunning porcelain tiles, beautiful chef's kitchen with Caesar stone bench tops, glass splashblack, stainless steel gas appliances and glass splashbacks.
Extra features include remote controlled lock up garage, parking for 2 more cars on drive way, 2 x split system air conditioners, landscaped gardens, rain water tank, clothes line, storage cage and much more!
This property would be built by local builders with high quality construction and attention to detail with many completed projects in the area that we can supply by request.
Ground Floor: 107m2
First Floor: 60.1m2
Secluded Private Open Space: 190m2
Garage: 23.3m2
Total building area: 167.1m2 (18squares approx.)
Total land area approx 300sqm.
Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity for this huge townhouse!
Expected completion December 2012.

Description:
When Family Comes First
Your family is counting on you to make the right decision. So if you want to put your family first, this is the one home that might make that decision a little easier. For starters you have the Primary school, Park and bus within walking distance and you're just a short drive from bustling Clayton's Shopping and cafe strip, train station and Monash Medical Centre. Set on a generous corner block there's plenty of room for kids to play in the front or secure backyard with covered outdoor area for adults to enjoy. Indoors the home is pristine with light & bright living room flowing to the meals area adjoining the spotless kitchen. With 3 robed bedrooms, ducted heating & vacuum system and single lock up garage, it's too good to an opportunity to miss!
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Description:
Corner Block, 2 Kitchens & Huge Workshop!
All offers considered! With so much to offer, this property represents a great buy in anyones language! Whether you are looking for a great first home, an investment property with a fantastic rental return or a site that offers the opportunity to subdivide and build another unit/townhouse beside it (STCA). This property offers it all! Situated within close proximity to Monash University, Monash Hospital, Ikea super store and minutes walk to Westall train station, the location is second to none. The original solid brick home features 2 bedrooms, plus study/3rd bedroom, spacious kitchen, lounge and self contained brick bungalow that has its own kitchen and bathroom. Live in the home and easily rent out the large bungalow for $130-$150 per week. Also features a huge workshop with powered roller door, great for the home mechanic or handyman. An exciting opportunity awaits the astute purchaser. Call now for an inspection and you will see the many opportunities that this property will offer.
Features:
*Build another unit beside it (STCA)
*Walk to Station
*On the border of Clayton/Clayton South.
*5 minutes walk to bus stop.
*$500 potential weekly rental.

Description:
1st home buyers save $20,000. before june30th
There's still time to get your government grants and get into the market with this stylish, modern open plan single level townhouse.
With quality fixtures and fittings and comprising of three good sized bedrooms, master with ensuite, open plan kitchen/dining leading out through bi-fold doors to sun-filled alfresco decking.
With a double lock up garage, cesar stone bench tops, gas stainless steel appliances and a neutral dcor throughout, this home is a must inspect.

Description:
Huge Potential On 682m2 Of Land! Endless Opportunities!
This fantastic 4 bedroom home on a large block of 682sqm of land appeals to both the homebuyer and developer/investor. Located within close proximity to Clayton Train Station, public transport, local schools, parklands and Clayton Central Shopping District, this massive allotment is ready for you to relax in, renovate, redevelop again!
Comprising: 4 large bedrooms, central bathroom, kitchen with gas appliances and meals area, all on a huge block of 682sqm approx. With fantastic dual occupancy potential to develop at the rear (S.T.C.A.).
15.3m x 44.55m = 682sqm Approximately

Under Instructions from the State Trustees Ltd

Situated on a generous 530sqm allotment it includes a spacious living room, smart kitchen with casual dining area, central bathroom and a generous back garden with single garage and storeroom/workshop. Perfect to move in now and update at your leisure and within only minutes to Clayton Road shops and station.

Description:
NEAR NEW BRILLIANCE WITH UNRIVALLED QUALITY!
Feel safe and secure in this quality built 2 bedroom, 2 bath plus study 'as new' single level rear town residence. Beautifully appointed with added detail, this spacious entertainer enjoys fabulous open plan living zones spilling onto the relaxing courtyard and easy care garden; designer euro kitchen appliances, stylish bedrooms (ensuite & fitted WIR), vogue bathrooms and laundry. Flawless with stone benchtops, timber floors, this private hideaway features zoned reverse cycle ducted air conditioning/heating, new blinds & 2000L water tank. Own title, moments to shops, train, schools and parkland.
Moses Sawiris : 0421 485 627

Description:
High life, low maintenance!
Fantastically located within minutes of primary schools, parks, Clayton's one stop shopping strip which includes; banks, restaurants, cafes, butchers, groceries, hairdressers, the list goes on and on, anything you name it we may have it! Ideal for first home buyer or families seeking location, security and the lifestyle in Clayton!
Comprises; 3 good size bedrooms with family bathroom, separate shower room, toilet, light-filled lounge, open kitchen adjoining family/meals area large, further extended by an undercover veranda great for family outdoor entertaining and overlooking a large and low maintenance rear garden, together with a long drive way and single car accommodation.
Great & affordable family home in clayton!
Contact Sharline Tsung :0416 086 818

Description:
Owner Says Sell! Fully Renovated As-New Double Brick Residence! PRICE REDUCTION $345,000
Fantastic opportunity for the first-home buyer or smart investor to secure this fully renovated double brick residence.
Situated only 500m from Clayton Shopping Centre, Clayton Community Centre, local shops, schools and kindergartens, and only minutes away from Clayton Train Station, Monash Medical Centre, Monash University, what more could you ask for? Walk to everything or catch a bus right outside and be in Clayton in 2 minutes flat!
With a modern brand new kitchen with stainless steel appliances and gas cooking, brand new carpet and new bathroom, all the hard work has been done for you! Move right in!
Owner-builder maintained ever since it was built, this never-been-released solid unit first time on the market would not last long!

Description:
Look! I've Been Totally Renovated
There's nothing left to do here except move in, relax and enjoy the fruits of someone else's labour. Secure behind a high fence and double gates, the home's modest facade invites you to step inside and discover the fabulous updates that have transformed this home into a modern-day delight,, with glistening polished floorboards enhancing the spacious living area, flowing to the meals and brand new stainless steel kitchen, new carpet in the 3 bedrooms, modern bathroom, GDH, air-conditioner, grassy backyard for kids, double garage/workshop & carport. There's no better place for a young family to start a new life with Westall College, Primary school and station within walking distance & short drive to Clayton Shopping strip & cafes and Monash Medical Centre.
Photo ID Required
Anna Mastrogiannis : 0416 235 329

Stamp Duty Savings. Plus $20k First Home Buyer Grant.
CONSTRUCTION NOW STARTED!
Take advantage of stamp duty savings of the building costs. First home buyers grant finishing June 2012, so take advantage of sale at auction!
For this architectually designed double story townhouse with 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 3 toilets, good size living room, separate laundry, powder room with toilet and single lock up garage. Building size 16.7sq . Completion date approximately October 2012. This property is close to Westall train Station, Westall Secondary college, Westall primary school and bus stops. Description:
Best Value House in Clayton South
Set in a court location, this solid brick home with an updated kitchen, sits on a comfortable allotment of over 650sqm. With the convenience of the local park literally next door, unwind and let your kids run free, any day of the week.
Currently home to a big family, the property offers four good sized bedrooms, low maintenance timber floors, a newly installed kitchen with skylight & stainless steel appliances, evaporative cooling, gas heating and much more.
Most probably the best valued home in Clayton South, with the added bonus of further possibilities. Renovate, extend or redevelop (STCA), the scope is here for both the investor and home owner alike.

Description:
Number 1 for features, convenience and comfort!
A beautiful home, perfect for investors or home buyers who want spacious living but without the inconvenience of a large block. Situated within walking distance to train station and minutes to Clayton central shopping, Monash University, Hospital and Ikea Superstore.
The property features 3-4 bedrooms with BIRs, master with ensuite, 2 living areas and a modern kitchen that will allow you to entertain friends and family with ease. The property is also complimented by a remote lock up garage, private rear yard and gas ducted heating and air conditioning. Land Size approx 400sqm.
Many more surprises awaits the astute buyer upon inspection. Call now or you will miss out!

Description:
Attention First Home Buyer! Brand New 2 Bedroom Residences In Prime Location!
These fantastic two bedroom brand new residences will appeal to both the first homebuyer and the astute investor. Presenting a rare and fantastic opportunity within walking distance to Clayton Train Station, Clayton Community Centre (with swimming pool and library), Clayton Central Shopping District and Monash Medical Centre, 2 minute walk to bus stop which take you to Monash University.
Featuring: 2 large bedrooms with built-in-robes, ducted heating, spacious kitchen with stone bench tops, modern central bathroom, gas stainless steel appliances, large private courtyard, single remote garage and much, much more!
Eligible first home buyers who qualify for the brand new first home owner's grant of up to $20,000! Stamp duty savings available as well!
Just completed, these brand new units direct from the developer are priced to sell!

The Ultimate In Family Living

Namatjira Park
37a Springs Road, Clayton

Ultra modern living at its finest this spacious three bedrooms townhouse provides for both the home buyer and astute investor offering luxurious low maintenance living situated in a peaceful location.
Offering you a lifestyle to envy and enjoy with an abundance of living space throughout this home comprises of three large bedrooms with BIR's, master bedroom with ensuite, two bathrooms, three toilets, and separate laundry.
Features: double lock up garage with remote access, central heating throughout, modern kitchen with tops and s/steel appliances, dishwasher, meals area and large living area for entertaining family and friends.
With easy access to Westall Secondary College, Westall train station, Monash University, Monash medical centre, Clayton shopping village and transportation move rite in put your feet up and enjoy.

Description:
Street Frontage & Almost New
With its own street frontage, this stunning townhouse provides fantastic accommodation and plenty of appeal for those seeking a convenient lifestyle close to all of Claytons amenities. Downstairs features a master bedroom complete with ensuite & built- in robe and free flowing open plan living, with a spacious lounge, stone topped kitchen and dining area overlooking the secure, low maintenance North facing garden. While upstairs provides 3 further double bedrooms and a spacious family bathroom and separate toilet. Packed with features like intercom entry, ducted heating, split system cooling, water tank and remote garage, this is easy living at its best. Located a short walk from Clayton Station and shopping strip this is an ideal home or investment.

Description:
Brand New Designer Style Townhouse With Own Street Frontage
This beautiful architecturally designed double storey modern town residence offers great value located in a convenient locale within minutes of Clayton central and Community Centre (Swimming Centre and Library), schools, train station and buses. Comprising formal living room, large dining and family area opening to private landscaped courtyard, 3 large robed bedrooms, and ensuite to main, stunning kitchen with stainless steel appliances and dishwasher, contemporary central bathroom - 3 bathrooms & 3 toilets in total, ducted heating and cooling, remote single lockup garage, water tanks and landscaped garden surrounds.
Note: Eligible first home owners grant and bonuses apply!!
